data.md:MetaData: (Table T1) Average grain sizes of minerals from ODP Holes 206-1256C (Unit 18) and 206-1256D (Unit 1)
14 cores, 120.2 m cored, 220.1 m drilled, 50.8 % recovery
Data report: Textural variation of Units 1256C-18 and 1256D-1 lava pond, with special reference to recrystallization of the base of Unit 1256C-18
